post.body: Funny that you are not the first update I've seen about this today! I try to save all errands for weekdays.
My favorite city in the U.S.!
Junkyard Dawgs forever!
So very sleepy and going to bed (but probably not actually falling asleep for at least an hour). G'night!
I find it interesting & cool that my two favorite musicians (Dave Matthews & Marc Broussard) are both Capricorns like me. Happy b-day to us!
Gonna watch some TV while continuing to organize my life. So far, so good - many things crossed off the to-do list in the past 2 days!
Needs to eat something - it's 4:15pm and I'll I've had today is some almonds.
Just spent WAY TOO LONG reading Dave Matthews' Twitter updates. He likes to reply to people and Twitter while on the toilet.
Tina Fey's updates on Twitter are AWESOME. She really did deserve the Entertainer of the Year title they gave her!
Getting shit done!
Does anyone even use AIM (or whatever instant messenger you prefer) now that everyone is on Facebook/MySpace?
Slept in and loved it - cold now that I'm out of bed. Continuing with the new year organization today...
Actually ended up doing a lot of work today and new year organization, but I'm exhausted and going to bed now.
Going to forage for some dinner.
Listening to the recently released 10-24-2002 Dave Matthews show from Benaroya Hall in Seattle. I was there - fun night.
Enjoying a low-key Saturday with no plans - the New Year will officially kick into gear for me on Monday.
Chillin'.
Dinnertime!
Does anyone else get little crushes on people from their past once they reconnect with them on Facebook? Good times.
Majorly cleaning the house - it's ugly outside.
